title: Lower Shaft
description:
This is a small square room which is at the bottom of a long
shaft. To the east is a passageway and to the northeast a very narrow
passage. In the shaft can be seen a heavy iron chain.

up.failureMessage: You can't go up from here.

atmosphere: The air is cool and damp.
Water drips somewhere in the darkness.
Your footsteps echo off the stone walls.
